parameters.name: BlockIp
parameters.description: The IP address that you want to block by using the defense rule.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the defense rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: invalid
*   **1**: enabled
*   **2**: failed
